blogPost.excerpt: Generate a 3D character that looks very similar to you with just three photos. Apply different ready-made animations to the model and record some fun, attractive videos with it in Augmented Reality.
blogPost.body: Generate a 3D character that looks very similar to you with just three photos. Apply different ready-made animations to the model and record some fun, attractive videos with it in Augmented Reality.
blogPost.title: Highavenue - Generate a 3D model that looks like you & apply AR effects
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 只需三张照片就能生成一个与你非常相似的3D角色。将不同的现成动画应用到模型上，并在增强现实中用它录制一些有趣、有吸引力的视频。
localize.tagline: 生成一个看起来像你的3D模型，并应用AR效果。

localize.description: 只需三張照片就能生成一個與你非常相似的3D角色。將不同的現成動畫應用到模型上，並在增強現實中用它錄製一些有趣、有吸引力的視頻。
localize.tagline: 生成一個看起來像你的3D模型，並應用AR效果。

previous.excerpt: Sivo provides debt as a service. Our API allows companies to access debt funding and lend money to their users at scale. Sivo is backed by Y Combinator (W21).
previous.title: Sivo - Access debt funding and lend money to users at scale

localize.description: Sivo提供债务即服务。我们的API允许企业获得债务融资，并大规模地借钱给用户。Sivo得到了Y Combinator（W21）的支持。
localize.tagline: 获取债务资金，规模化借贷给用户

localize.description: Sivo提供債務即服務。我們的API允許企業獲得債務融資，並大規模地借錢給用戶。Sivo得到了Y Combinator（W21）的支持。
localize.tagline: 獲取債務資金，規模化借貸給用戶

next.excerpt: 🌍 Unfolded Studio is a geospatial analytics platform that makes it easy to drag and drop LARGE datasets to create powerful visualizations from your browser and share with the team!
next.title: Unfolded Studio - Explore a world of data with advanced geospatial analytics

localize.description: 🌍 Unfolded Studio是一个地理空间分析平台，可以轻松地拖放大型数据集，从浏览器中创建强大的可视化，并与团队分享。
localize.tagline: 利用先进的地理空间分析技术探索数据世界。

localize.description: 🌍 Unfolded Studio是一個地理空間分析平臺，可以輕鬆地拖放大型數據集，從瀏覽器中創建強大的可視化，並與團隊分享。
localize.tagline: 利用先進的地理空間分析技術探索數據世界。
